bibl.title: Coptic Texts Relating to Daily Life.
bibl.note: Preface. - Chapter I: Manuscript No. 3530. - Chapter II: Manuscript No. 4057 [Coptic letter with Greek address; ed.: Leslie S.B. MacCoull, The Apa Apollos Monastery of Pharoou (Aphrodito) and its Papyrus Archive, Muséon 106 (1993) pp. 21-63]. - Chapter III: Three fragments: Manuscript Nos. 3418, 2677, 3376. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Maher Ahmed Eissa, Coptic Texts Relating to Daily Life.
Alexandria, Bibliotheca Alexandrina, 2008, 8°, 88 pp., 5 figg. ISBN 978-977-452-173-7.

Preface. - Chapter I: Manuscript No. 3530. - Chapter II: Manuscript No. 4057 [Coptic letter with Greek address; ed.: Leslie S.B.
